title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 February 2016 - XWiki
content:
<Enygma`> has quit  
00:12 <cjd> has quit  
00:22 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
04:50 <HillHobbit> has joined #xwiki  
04:53 <HillHobbit> \msg NickServ register mrl#221ia20  
04:53 <HillHobbit> confusion reigns  
05:05 <HillHobbit> Hi, I am trying to download the war version of xwiki and the page seems to be broken.  
05:05 <HillHobbit> I get the message "unable to connect" for http://download.forge.ow2.org/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise-web-8.0-milestone-2.war  
05:08 <HillHobbit> wrong venu?  
05:25 <HillHobbit> Ok. Well.... there are other wikis with websites that work. But, xwiki looks very cool. :-(  
05:51 <HillHobbit> More investigation. Grenoble server seems to have issues. It's about 6:00 AM there. I will try again tomorrow.  
06:00 <HillHobbit> has left #xwiki

14:17 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:18 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:19 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:21 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:48 <vmassol> tmortagne: you modified my change at http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiTeam?viewer=changes&rev2=5.1  
14:48 <tmortagne> vmassol: see Skype  
14:48 <vmassol> we're now called the XWiki Core Development Team  
14:48 <vmassol> ok checking  
14:49 <vmassol> ok so there was no link for the author anymore  
14:49 <tmortagne> yes  
14:49 <vmassol> ok I'll let you suggest the proper way to make the move :)  
14:50 <vmassol> (thanks for fiwing)  
14:50 <vmassol> \*fixing  
14:50 <tmortagne> just need to have Maven matching xwiki.org  
14:50 <vmassol> it's not just  
14:51 <vmassol> so it seems we also need to create a new user and keep the old one  
14:51 <vmassol> deprecating the old one  
14:51 <vmassol> and progressively update extensions  
14:52 <tmortagne> most of these extension at imported after a release, the only exception is a few extensions moved to contrib  
14:52 <vmassol> I think this is a flaw btw  
14:52 <tmortagne> s/at/are/  
14:52 <vmassol> the pom shouldn't use the name but the id  
14:52 <vmassol> the id can remain and then ame should be allowed to be modified  
14:52 <vmassol> s/name/display name  
14:53 <tmortagne> still the pom should contain the right name and it's not the case even in master right now
